report.name: 站点货量查询
report.sql: select s.name 网点, count(t.code) 票数, sum(t.amount) 件数, round( sum(t.weight) ) 重量 from usr_vf.gt_trans_order t, usr_vf.gt_site s where t.send_site_id = s.id and ? in (s.id, s.parent_site_id) and t.created_time >= trunc(sysdate) group by s.name

select s.name 网点, count(t.code) 票数, sum(t.amount) 件数, round( sum(t.weight) ) 重量 from usr_vf.gt_trans_order t, usr_vf.gt_site s where t.send_site_id = s.id and ? in (s.id, s.parent_site_id) and t.created_time >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.created_time <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by s.name

select s.name 网点, count(t.code) 票数, sum(t.amount) 件数, round( sum(t.weight) ) 重量 from usr_vf.gt_trans_order t, usr_vf.gt_site s where t.send_site_id = s.id and ${param1} in (s.id, s.parent_site_id) and t.created_time >= to_date('${param2}','yyyy-mm-dd') and t.created_time <= to_date('${param3}','yyyy-mm-dd') group by s.name
